description: The sterilization configuration segment contains information specific to configuration of a sterilizer or washer for processing sterilization or decontamination loads.

1.name: Number Of Decontamination/Sterilization Devices
1.description: The number of decontamination/sterilization devices recognized by the instrument-tracking system. The decontamination/sterilization device(s) would configure itself based on the data in this message.

2.name: Labor Calculation Type
2.description: The method at which labor is calculated for use in tracking employee productivity.

3.name: Date Format
3.description: The format of the date that is used to record date parameters of a decontamination/sterilization instance.

5.name: Device Name
5.description: The name of the device associated with the device number in SCP-4 (e.g., VAC)

7.name: Device Type
7.description: The type of device, such as a steam sterilizer or gas sterilizer.

8.name: Lot Control
8.description: A code assigned to a device to indicate if the sterilization load is built in the sub-sterile area adjacent to an Operating Room or the Central Processing Department (Central Supply).
